---
id: apply-labels-to-actions
title: "Replace action labels"
description: "Applies the given list of labels to the given pipeline actions. Existing labels are replaced — include labels to be preserved in `labelIds`."

hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: platform-api//seqera-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Replace action labels"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/actions/labels/apply"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Applies the given list of labels to the given pipeline actions. Existing labels are replaced — include labels to be preserved in `labelIds`.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
